content: ©2022 zarakh creations alternating colorway colors a = black 224 grams / 490 yards b = silver 144 grams / 315 yards c = white 144 grams / 315 yards instructions make twelve 12 squares in color a/ background color following the shaping for single color squares make a total of 52 squares with the following color combinations following the shaping for two color squares 16 color a / color b 16 color a / color c 20 color b / color c total 64 squares 12 single color squares 52 two color squares arrange squares to form star pattern with right sides facing up the row where the color change shows a visible line of each color should be facing down sew together and weave in ends woven carpenter star baby blanket ©2022 zarakh creations rainbow shift colorway colors a = cream 224 grams / 490 yards b =fairy tale 36 grams / 80 yards c = red 36 grams / 80 yards d = orange 36 grams / 80 yards e = canary 36 grams / 80 yards f = alfalfa 36 grams / 80 yards g = tranquil 36 grams / 80 yards h = marina 36 grams / 80 yards i = celestial 36 grams / 80 yards woven carpenter star baby blanket ©2022 zarakh creations instructions total 64 squares 12 single color squares 52 two color squares make twelve 12 squares in color a/ background color following the shaping for single color squares make a total of 52 squares with the following color arrange squares to form star pattern with right sides facing combinations following the shaping for two color squares up the row where the color change shows a visible line of each color should be facing down 4 color a/ color b 4 color a / color c sew together and weave in ends 4 color a / color d 4 color a / color e 4 color a / color f 4 color a / color g 4 color a / color h 4 color a / color i 4 color b/ color c 4 color d/ color e 4 color f/ color g 4 color h/ color i 1 color b/ color h 1 color c/ color d 1 color f/ color i 1 color g/ color e woven carpenter star baby blanket ©2022 zarakh creations
